entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Should platform package pruning data represent GA of a framework or the serviced version? #44566
  • dotnet format won't newline an empty catch block #44564
  • SDK doesn't find/use bundled library-packs when additional NuGet sources are specified. #44547
  • [NETSDKE2E][Workload set]After running "dotnet workload update" and clicking "No" first and then "Yes" on UAC prompt, Unhandled exception " Workload update failed:System.IO.FileNotFoundException: Workload version 9.0.100-servicing.24530.1..., was not found." occurs #44546
    10.0.1xx
  • [Aspire]: Stopping a resource on windows always exits ungracefully (exit code 1) #44544
    9.0.2xx
  • [Aspire]: dotnet watch changing files in a leaf node project causes the entire project hierarchy to process to exit #44543
    9.0.2xx
  • [Aspire]: dotnet watch kills process tree on windows and does not let DCP cleanup containers #44542
    9.0.2xx

Closed

  • dotnet-watch: HotReloadProfile not detected correctly on unrestored app #44044
  • dotnet-watch: Investigate CI test failure: RuntimeProcessLauncherTests.UpdateAppliedToNewProcesses #42612
  • [Aspire]: Dashboard does not show logs when using dotnet watch #44319
  • Dotnet watch pops browser and asks for auth token, but token is never printed to the console #44259
    9.0.2xx
  • [Aspire]: dotnet watch IDE protocol doesn't update any process state #44318

PullRequests

Created

  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove source build warn on diff test infra #44569
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Refactor source build tests to used common extracted sdk #44568
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Prevent propagation of Ctrl+C to child processes #44565
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the loc build to target 9.0.2xx #44563
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #44540
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44479
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove prep-source-build.sh invocation from vmr devcontainer config #44548
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [FIX] tool-update: Compare tool versions correctly #44517
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Aspire notifications #44348
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat

Updated

  • sln-list: Support for slnx #44537
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Gather test diag logging to track down nuget issue #44455
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Set mediaType from http response if manifest mediaType is not present #44530
    Servicing-consider, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Multi arch containers #43085
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Move test templates to SDK repo #44417
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Browser refresh and WASM delta applier refactoring #44539
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
